name: jrc-hydro-power-plants-database
title: JRC Hydro Power Database
description: This dataset is an output of the Energy work package of the Water-Energy-Food-Ecosystems (WEFE) Nexus project at the European Commission's Joint Research Centre (JRC). This dataset has been created for power system modelling purposes and it is based on publicly available sources. This dataset tries to collect some basic information on all the European hydro-power plants. Other related datasets are available in the JRC Data Catalogue.

fields.name: id
fields.title: ID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the hydro-power plant

fields.name: installed_capacity_MW
fields.title: Installed Capacity (MW)
fields.description: Electrical power generation capacity in MW

fields.name: pumping_MW
fields.title: Pumping Capacity (MW)
fields.description: Pumping capacity in MW (only when specified)

fields.name: type
fields.title: Type
fields.description: Typology of the power plant, according to the Dispa-SET classification of technologies http://www.dispaset.eu/en/latest/data.html

fields.name: country_code
fields.title: Country Code
fields.description: Country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

fields.name: lat
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the power plant in decimal degrees

fields.name: lon
fields.title: Longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the power plant in decimal degrees (-180, 180)

fields.name: dam_height_m
fields.title: Dam Height (m)
fields.description: Nominal head of the dam in meters

fields.name: volume_Mm3
fields.title: Volume (Mm3)
fields.description: Useful capacity of the reservoir in million of cubic meters

fields.name: storage_capacity_MWh
fields.title: Storage Capacity (MWh)
fields.description: Potential quantity of energy that can be stored in MWh

fields.name: pypsa_id
fields.title: PyPSA ID
fields.description: Association with the ID column from https://github.com/PyPSA/pypsa-eur/blob/master/resources/powerplants.csv

fields.name: GEO
fields.title: GEO ID
fields.description: Association with the GEO Assigned Identification Number from http://globalenergyobservatory.org/

fields.name: WRI
fields.title: WRI ID
fields.description: Association with the WRI Global Power Plant Database from https://www.wri.org/publication/global-power-plant-database
